title: varuvAr varuvAr
sahitya:
varuvAr varuvAr enrE vazhi pArttu ninruLLEn virai kAla dEvanO oru nAzhiyum nillAn


anupallavi

  tiraiyODum kaDal mEvum tiruccendil nagar vAzhum maruvAr kaDam paNiyum maNivEla murugEshar


caraNam    anbar azhaittAl avar aruLODu vArAmal Avi shOravE ennai alara sheivadum EnO 
enpAl avar koNDavan kOpamariyEnE enrAgilum parivAik-kunrADum nAyakar
